law.catch_line: A person may not sell or offer for sale a nonlatex condom by means of a vending machine or other aut...

text.section: A person may not sell or offer for sale a nonlatex condom by means of a vending machine or other automatic device.

section.section: A person who violates this section is guilty of a misdemeanor and on conviction is subject to a fine not exceeding $1,000 for each violation.
Each vending machine or other automatic device in violation of this section is a separate violation.
